message: Hi Bob, I have an amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still a bit hesitant at $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I can meet you halfway between $105 and $110, so I'll offer it to you for $107.50
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $107.50. Would you be willing to go down to $105 again?
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'll give you a bit more wiggle room, but I need to make a profit. I'll meet you at $106, that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $106. Would you be willing to meet me at $104?

I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I'll give you one last chance to make a deal. I'll meet you at $105 again, but this is my final offer on that price. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand that this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $104 and $105, so I'll offer $104.50. This is my last counteroffer.
